## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G31320](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G31320)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PARP1</u>
- **Gene Name:** POLY(ADP-RIBOSE) POLYMERASE 1
- **Description:**   poly(ADP-ribose) polymerase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2042511
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
